name: shaun-prompt
description: Pretty, minimal and fast ZSH prompt

scripts.postinstall: dest=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions; mkdir -p $dest && ln -sf "$PWD/shaun.zsh" $dest/prompt_shaun_setup || echo 'Could not automagically symlink the prompt. Check out the readme on how to do it manually: https://github.com/rqelibari/shaun#manually'
